title: Infocurso
text: This was not my first contact with programming, but represents the time I decided to take it seriously as my career. Although being mainly fundamentals on HTML and CSS, it also taught me about Adobe Photoshop and Google Webdesign (besides I don't use it daily).

title: GoStack
text: As I continued to study more and more, exploring all sorts of courses via Udemy and other websites like that, I ended up participating on Next Level Week #3, where I developed a simple orphanage finding page called Happy.
